description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国回族政治人物，曾任宁夏回族自治区政协副主席、银川市人民政府市长及第七届全国人大代表。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Hui ethnicity, who served as Vice Chairman of the CPPCC Ningxia Committee, Mayor of Yinchuan Municipal People's Government, and a delegate to the 7th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国黑龙江省齐齐哈尔市下辖的县，金晓昀的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Qiqihar, Heilongjiang province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Jin Xiaoyun.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议宁夏回族自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议宁夏回族自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在宁夏回族自治区的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国宁夏回族自治区首府银川市的一所综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Yinchuan, the capital of the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宁夏回族自治区银川市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Yinchuan City, Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，金晓昀是中华人民共和国的政治人物。
description.en: According to the text, Jin Xiaoyun is a politician of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 金晓昀出生于黑龙江省克山县。
description.en: Jin Xiaoyun was born in Keshan County, Heilongjiang Province.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议宁夏回族自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 金晓昀曾担任宁夏回族自治区政协副主席。
description.en: Jin Xiaoyun served as the Vice Chairman of the CPPCC Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region Committee.

description.zh-cn: 金晓昀曾任第七届全国人大代表。
description.en: Jin Xiaoyun served as a delegate to the 7th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 金晓昀是宁夏大学的校友。
description.en: Jin Xiaoyun is an alumna of Ningxia University.

description.zh-cn: 金晓昀是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Jin Xiaoyun is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 金晓昀曾担任银川市人民政府市长。
description.en: Jin Xiaoyun served as the Mayor of Yinchuan Municipal People's Government.
